metadata.description: Letter to Secretary Basilio Valdes from Glicerio Quisumbing reporting on the condition of telegraph communications between Tacloban and Palo and his recommendations on actions to be taken
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; letters; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
